stocks.impact_theory: Gilead Sciences announced a $7.8B acquisition of Arcellx at $115/share, sparking a massive repricing. Economically, it signals robust M&A appetite in biotech amid cancer therapy demand. Market psychology: euphoria over premium deal, FOMO buying. Historical parallels: similar surges in 2023 biotech takeovers like Seagen (Pfizer). Analogies: 1) Winning a jackpot - instant value unlock. 2) Wedding proposal - commitment boosts confidence.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Deal premium to $115, stock at 114, X sentiment positive on acquisition, web news confirms surge post-announcement, likely closes higher barring issues.

potential_profit_risks.long_position: Long for 5-10% gains to deal price, hold till close.

stocks.justification: Definitive agreement announced, massive premium, biotech M&A precedent strong.

stocks.impact_theory: Q4 earnings beat with record margins, Lake Street upgrade to Buy PT$50. Economic: diabetes tech demand rises with obesity epidemic. Psychology: relief rally post-transition issues. Parallels: 2021 insulin pump surges. Analogies: 1) Engine upgrade - smoother ride ahead. 2) Report card A+ - validation sparks buying.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Earnings beat drove 44% surge, analyst upgrade reinforces, X chatter positive on momentum.

potential_profit_risks.key_risks: Earnings digestion selloff, competition in pumps.

stocks.justification: Strong fundamentals, analyst support, high volume confirmation.

stocks.impact_theory: Positive clinical/FDA buzz driving 49% gain. Economic: expands motion sickness market. Psychology: catalyst chase in small biotech. Parallels: prior FDA approvals. Analogies: 1) Green light at race - acceleration. 2) Viral TikTok - sudden attention.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Listed as top gainer, FDA/earnings tailwinds per scans, sentiment shift positive.

stocks.justification: High mover but less specific news vs ACLX.

stocks.impact_theory: Bitcoin -2% drags crypto stocks amid tariff uncertainty. Economic: risk-off in speculative assets. Psychology: fear of trade wars hurting crypto adoption. Parallels: 2018 tariff crypto dip. Analogies: 1) Storm clouds over party. 2) Domino fall in chain.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: BTC drop, X posts confirm crypto stocks down 3-4%, broader market tariff fears.

potential_profit_risks.long_position: Long dip buy if BTC rebounds +10%.

stocks.justification: Correlated to BTC, tariff indirect but sentiment hit.

stocks.impact_theory: Northeast snowstorm causes 5k cancellations, tariffs add uncertainty. Economic: revenue hit from ops disruption, trade war fuel costs. Psychology: operational fear. Parallels: 2022 storm dips. Analogies: 1) Grounded planes. 2) Tariff toll booth slowdown.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Flight cancels news, airline stocks -4%, X/markets confirm volume spike down.
